channel.title: Need help adding dragon claws
channel.description: Well i was looking at my server and noticed the dragon claws dont work at all. All the bonus stats are at +0 and there is no special is there any way anyone could help me get them to work. (Same goes for vesta longsword) Im running a delta base.

item.title: Need help adding dragon claws
item.dc:creator: @cocain cocain
item.description:
@cocain wrote:

okay thanks do you know were i might beable to get the other id of the dragon claws tho?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help adding dragon claws
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“cocain, post:4, topic:297875”]thankssss[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 07:13:37 pm[/size][hr][quote author=eld0002 link=topic=394233.msg2930820#msg2930820 date=1251255772]
[center]Well to Change the Stats open your Item.java and in Wepons i think it is Add the ID of the D Clawz
Make sure to add it at the starter and have a , and the end of it then a space. Heres an Example
Should look somthing like this

public static int weapons[] = {IDOFCLAWZ, And the Other Id's Here.};

Now thats done, Go to Item.cfg
Scroll Right to the Bottom.
Now add this: item = CLAWID Dragon_claws A set of Fighting Claws. 900000.75812950955 900000.75812950955 900000.4541806258 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 56 0 0
And Save and Compile, Theres Your Stats :][/center]
[/quote] I get most of that except the other ids what do you mean by that?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2009, 07:15:34 pm[/size][hr][quote author=Maximum ZxZ link=topic=394233.msg2930815#msg2930815 date=1251255639]
Search DCdown in search bar to add spec to
Dragon Claws.
[/quote]not sure exactly what you mean :s[/quote]

I mean type in search bar “DCdown”. There’s tutorial on how to add D Claws spec.

Read full topic

Now thats done, Go to Item.cfg
Scroll Right to the Bottom.
Now add this: item = CLAWID Dragon_claws A set of Fighting Claws. 900000.75812950955 900000.75812950955 900000.4541806258 41 57 -4 0 0 13 26 7 56 0 0
And Save and Compile, Theres Your Stats :][/center]
